documentation.text: @notice The v1 price oracle, which will continue to serve prices for v1 assets
@notice Address of the guardian, which may set the SAI price once
@notice Address of the PEther contract, which has a constant price
@notice Address of the cUSDC contract, which we hand pick a key for
@notice Address of the cUSDT contract, which uses the cUSDC price
@notice Address of the cSAI contract, which may have its price set
@notice Address of the cDAI contract, which we hand pick a key for
@notice Handpicked key for USDC
@notice Handpicked key for DAI
@notice Frozen SAI price (or 0 if not set yet)

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only guardian may set the SAI price"

arguments.value: only guardian may set the SAI price

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only guardian may set the SAI price"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "SAI price may only be set once"

arguments.value: SAI price may only be set once

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "SAI price may only be set once"

 @param price The price for SAI
